overview:
CEO of Orange Advertising Network Americas (OANA) a subsidiary of France Telecom.

OANA runs the largest US hispanic online advertsing network and is also a major player in most countries in Latin America such as Mexico where it’s the 2nd largest online advertising network in the market. OANA is one of the leading networks also in Colombia, Argentina, Chile, Peru, Ecuador and Central America.

Giuliano Stiglitz has achieved significant audience and revenue growth since taking over as CEO transforming the company in one of the leading players in the US hispanic online media and a major player in Latin America with 70m unique users and over 2 billion monthly impressions.

Giuliano Stiglitz is also an angel investor, having invested in several tech start-ups over the past few years and a regular speaker at major industry events such as IAB Europe, AdTech London, AdTech New York, AdTech San Francisco and DMEXCO.

funding_round.source_description: “Etsy For Eco” Ethical Community Raises $300,000+ In Seed Funding
